addition.item: Initial release of Call Now Button module for Joomla 5 and 6
Multiple link types: Phone, WhatsApp, Custom URL
Two appearance styles: Circular icon and Icon with Text (pill-shaped)
18 built-in icons: Phone, WhatsApp, Telegram, Instagram, Facebook, and more
Full color customization for button and icon
Responsive design with device-specific size controls
Typography controls: Font size, color, and weight for text buttons
Custom margins control for button positioning
SEO optimized: Proper rel, target, and title attributes
Accessibility features: ARIA labels and alt text
Visual icon selector for easy icon picking
